heading: here comes sdmi, ready or not
subheading: the secure digital music initiative unleashes its controversial digital music framework for the world to see. a finished spec it ain't. by chris oakes.
author: chris oakes
text: after some last-minute delays, the music industry's controversial answer to digital music made its long-awaited debut tuesday. the secure digital music initiative published the first phase of its digital music framework for public review tuesday.read wired news' ongoing mp3 and digital music coverage
